original_title: Morning Show Mysteries: A Murder in Mind
overview: Billie Blessings is drawn into a murder investigation when Katie Sanders, a former server at Blessings-turned TV star, becomes the focus when it’s discovered the victim was blackmailing her. Billie must sift through the mounting evidence – and list of suspects – to get to the truth and clear her friend’s name.
title: Morning Show Mysteries: A Murder in Mind
